Question
========
Length contraction occurs

Answerlist
----------
* parallel to the direction of motion (longitudinal lengths).
* perpendicular to the direction of motion (transverse lengths).
* only when the object is approaching the speed of light.
* only when the object is not moving.

Solution
========
Length contraction occurs for any object moving relative to an observer in the direction of motion (longitudinal lengths).
